author: John Doe
name: Understanding React
description: Dive deep into the fundamentals of React, including JSX, components, state, and props. This post is perfect for developers who are just starting their journey with React and want to build interactive and dynamic user interfaces.

author: Jane Smith
name: Mastering Next.js
description: Explore the advanced features of Next.js, such as server-side rendering, API routes, and static site generation. This post provides insights into how Next.js simplifies complex web development challenges while enhancing performance.

author: Alice Johnson
name: CSS Modules Demystified
description: Learn how CSS Modules can help you manage styles in modern web applications. This post covers everything from setup to best practices, ensuring your CSS remains modular, maintainable, and conflict-free.

author: Bob Brown
name: A Guide to Axios
description: Discover the power of Axios for making API requests in JavaScript. This post walks you through its features, from basic usage to advanced scenarios like interceptors, error handling, and request cancellation.
